course_description: This course reviews the pathophysiology and therapeutics associated with multiple disease conditions. Students will translate understanding of pathophysiology, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics to clinical decision making for health promotion, risk reduction and disease management.
sections: Class Nbr: 2388, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: TTh 11a-2:30p, Instructor: Csaky/Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
